          <title>
            <string language="fr">Satellite tournant le long de son orbite elliptique</string>
            <string language="en">Satellite revolving along its elliptical orbit</string>

            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre un satellite tournant  autour de la terre le long de son orbite elliptique.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a satellite revolving around the Earth along its elliptical orbit.</string>
